author: Thomas Macaulay
title: Spain plans to use robots to test 80,000 people a day for the coronavirus
description: Spain plans to deploy a fleet of robots that will automate the country’s coronavirus testing. Swift testing is essential to curtail the spread of the pandemic. But it also exposes testers to the infection, risking their lives and further straining a workforce…
content:
Spain plans to deploy a fleet of robots that will automate the countrys coronavirus testing.
Swift testing is essential to curtail the spread of the pandemic. But it also exposes testers to the infection, risking their lives and further straining a workforce… [+1404 chars]
